channel.leave_desc: Are you sure want to leave this channel?
channel.transfer_desc: You need to transfer your channel ownership to someone else before leaving the channel.
channel.delete_desc: Are you sure want to delete this channel?
channel.name: Channel Name
channel.topic_placeholder: Let everyone know how to use this channel.(markdown supported)
channel.only_owner: Only Owner and Admin Can Send Message

dm.delete_desc: Are you sure want to delete this user?

overview.name: Server Name
overview.upload_desc: Minimum size is 128x128, We recommend at least 512x512 for the server. Max size limited to 5M.

sign_up.title: Default Sign Up
sign_up.desc: Who can sign up to this server.

user_msg_notify.title: New Message Notification Through Email
user_msg_notify.desc: you can control new message if send through email.

server_msg_notify.title: New Message Notification Through Email (Server)
server_msg_notify.desc: users can control new message if send through email, SMTP enabled first.

admin_create_group.title: Only Admins Can Create Group
admin_create_group.desc: If enabled, only admins can create group.

admin_see_group_members.title: Only Admins Can See Group Members
admin_see_group_members.desc: If enabled, only admins can see group members.

admin_only_can_invite.title: Only Admins Can Invite Users
admin_only_can_invite.desc: If enabled, only admins can invite new members.

enable_msg_url_preview.title: Enable URL Preview in Message
enable_msg_url_preview.desc: If enabled, url in message will show preview content.

guest_mode.title: Guest Mode
guest_mode.desc: If enabled, visitors will see public channels on this server.

message_sound.title: Message Sound
message_sound.desc: Play sound while receiving new message.

online_status.title: Online Status
online_status.desc: If enabled, members will see the online/offline status of each other.

chat_layout.title: Chat Layout
chat_layout.desc: Which side to show messages sent by yourself

contact_verify.title: Contact Verification
contact_verify.desc: By default all server members can see each other. If you want server members to add and manage their own contacts, please enable the contact feature (admin will be in the contacts list by default).

webclient_auto_update.title: Web Client Auto Update
webclient_auto_update.desc: If enabled, the web client will automatically update to the latest version. ⚠️ This feature is designed for advanced users only. Disabling it may prevent you from receiving the latest bug fixes and feature updates.

clear_files.title: Files and Images Data
clear_files.desc: Click the button below to remove all files and images data of this server.

clear_msgs.title: All Messages Data
clear_msgs.desc: Click the button below to remove all the chat data including texts and files of this server.

auto_delete_file.title: Auto-delete File Data
auto_delete_file.desc: Set expire time for all file data of this server.
auto_delete_file.confirm_desc: All files older than the set time will be deleted.

license.update_placeholder: Please input the new license value

tip.title: A chance to get a free license upgrade!
tip.user_test: Get a free license upgrade through a 25 min user testing

license.tip_renewing: Renewing the License, do not close the window!
license.tip_domain: The license is bound to domain (without port), please confirm or update your setting:
license.tip_port: Fill out your domain name without port.

bot.bot_tip_title: Bots can send messages to channels.
bot.bot_tip_desc: Please note that we do not display a Bot’s API key again after generation. You can always generate a new API key of a Bot by clicking “Add API Key” and this won’t nullify the previous API key(s).
bot.webhook_tip_title: Webhooks can receive messages in a channel and should a URL provided by you.
bot.webhook_tip_desc: Please provide a webhook URL that will return 200.
bot.manage_desc: You can delete a bot anytime, the bot user will be removed immediately and all APIs will be nullified.
bot.create_desc: Give your bot a name. You can also add an endpoint webhook URL to receive data.
bot.create_key_desc: Create API Key to authenticate your communication
bot.create_key_warning: Make sure to copy the API Key now. You won’t be able to see it again!
bot.delete_desc: Are you sure to delete the Bot?
bot.delete_key_desc: Are you sure to delete this Bot API Key?

auto_delete_msg.title: Delete messages sent by myself after certain time period.
auto_delete_msg.desc: This will remove the messages data stored on both the server and client side.
auto_delete_msg.clear_title: Clear all messages in this channel.
auto_delete_msg.clear_desc: This will remove all the messages data stored on both the server and client side.

firebase.desc: Message notification requires Google Firebase as the default method.
firebase.sub_desc: We have provided an official configuration. Make sure google FCM is accessible from your server and device.

smtp.desc: For new message Email notification (advanced feature, upgrade to <0>VoceChat Pro</0>) and new sign-up email verification, we use SMTP.
smtp.sub_desc: Please set up your SMTP below.

agora.desc: For video and audio calls, we use Agora API.
agora.sub_desc: Each Agora project will enjoy 10,000 mins free API usages per month. Please create a project by yourself. Follow the instruction below to configure your Agora correctly.

vocespace.title: VoceSpace
prerequisite: For enterprises customization or need help, please contact han@privoce.com or add WeChat: Privoce
vocespace.sub_desc: Each VoceSpace account will enjoy no limit minutes, 5 person concurrent and 4k resolution for free. No account creation required. Follow the instruction below to configure your VoceSpace correctly.
vocespace.domain_desc: This domain needs to have a DNS A record pointing to the current server IP you are hosting VoceChat.
vocespace.how_to: After enabling, please set a custom domain then click save, and the system will automatically enable VoceSpace.
vocespace.old: Your current server version is outdated. We have enabled the official VoceSpace (vocespace.com) as your default audio/video service. To use your own private deployment, please update vocechat-server to v0.5.8 or higher.

third_app.update_tip: Are you sure to update API secret? Previous secret will be invalided
third_app.key_tip: The security key agreed between the server and the third-party app is used to encrypt the communication data.

login.magic_link_desc: Allows members login with Magic Link.

passkey.title: Passkeys
passkey.desc: Manage your passkeys for passwordless login
passkey.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey?
passkey.enter_name: Enter a name for this passkey

widget.tip: Extending VoceChat by embedding the vocechat widget SDK!
widget.code_comment: put this code snippet into your html file
widget.custom_style_tip: if you want customize the widget position more precisely, use the widget element ID in your HTML or CSS file, like this
widget.css_code_tip: You can also customize CSS code, which will be loaded into the widget as a CSS file
widget.param_host: Assign the user chatting with visitor(User ID)
widget.param_auto_reg: true: Auto register a new user if not exist, false: need visitor to input email and name to register
widget.param_login_token: If you are using your own platform's existing user info to generate VoceChat new account, this is the login token generated by your platform, for more details, please refer to: https://doc.voce.chat/zh-cn/login-with-other-account. Don't fill this out for default scenarios (no 3-rd party user system)!
widget.share_link: Share the widget link so that people can chat with you directly

version.sync: Sync to the latest version of web client

api_doc.desc: We have detailed API documentation that you can build your own chat tool based on.
api_doc.step_1: Step One: Change to your own Server
api_doc.step_2: Step Two: Input the login token
api_doc.step_2_desc: You can get the token by access X-API-Key http header or just copy the text below:
api_doc.last: Every API has a 'Try it Out' button, and you can debug the API with it
